name: Yareli Prime
description: The Waverider arises, reborn from the ocean foam. In her original Orokin-era splendor she embodies the undying vigor of youth.

abilities.name: Sea Snares
abilities.description:
Form five water globules that seek out enemies and expand on contact, simultaneously damaging and immobilizing their victims.
Enemies hit by the globules take increased damage from all sources.

abilities.name: Merulina
abilities.description: Summon Merulina, a rideable creature of the waves, and the inspiration for K-Driving. Merulina protects Yareli by absorbing a large portion of incoming damage.

abilities.name: Aquablades
abilities.description: Tear through foes with a trio of orbiting aquatic blades.

abilities.name: Riptide
abilities.description: Drag enemies into a crushing maelstrom and then blow them away in a watery burst. Each enemy trapped in the vortex increases the burst's damage.

languages.description: Der Wellenreiter erhebt sich, aus Meerschaum neugeboren, in ihrer ursprünglichen Pracht aus der Orokin Ära, welche ihre unsterbliche jugendliche Kraft verkörpert.
languages.name: Yareli Prime

languages.description: Waverider surgit, renaissant de l'écume de l'océan. Dans sa splendeur originelle de l'ère Orokin, elle incarne la vigueur éternelle de la jeunesse.
languages.name: Yareli Prime

languages.description: La Waverider sorge, rinata dalla schiuma dell'oceano. Nel suo splendore originale dell'era Orokin, incarna l'eterno vigore della giovinezza.
languages.name: Yareli Prime

languages.description: 바다의 거품에서 다시 태어난 파도의 기수가 일어섭니다. 오로킨 시절 본래 지녔던 화려함 속에, 그녀는 불멸하는 젊음의 활력을 체현하고 있습니다.
languages.name: 야렐리 프라임

languages.description: La Surfista emerge, renacida de la espuma marina. En su esplendor original de la era Orokin, encarna el vigor imperecedero de la juventud.
languages.name: Yareli Prime

languages.description: 驭浪者从海浪中重生。她以 Orokin 时代的风采，体现出青春不朽的活力。
languages.name: Yareli Prime

languages.description: Укротительница волн восстаёт, возрождаясь из пены океана. В своём изначальном орокинском великолепии, она воплощает неувядающую силу юности.
languages.name: Ярели Прайм

languages.description: ウェーブライダーが海の泡から甦る。オロキン時代の彼女の姿は若さ故の不滅の活力を表す。
languages.name: Yareli Prime

languages.description: Surferka powstaje, odrodzona z morskiej piany. W swojej pierwotnej świetności z czasów Orokin uosabia nieśmiertelny wigor młodości.
languages.name: Yareli Prime

languages.description: A Surfista emerge, renascida da espuma do mar. Em seu esplendor original da era Orokin, incorpora o vigor imortal da juventude.
languages.name: Yareli Prime

languages.description: 乘浪者從泡沫海浪生起。以最初 Orokin 時代的風采體現不朽的青春活力。
languages.name: Yareli Prime

languages.description: เวฟไรเดอร์ถือกำเนิดขึ้นมาจากฟองคลื่นในมหาสมุทร มีความงดงามดั้งเดิมในแบบยุค Orokin เป็นตัวแทนของพลังแห่งความเยาว์วัยตลอดกาล
languages.name: Yareli Prime

languages.description: Waverider, okyanus köpüğünden yeniden doğarak yükseliyor. Orokin dönemindeki ihtişamın dinmek bilmeyen canlılığıyla vücut bulmuş hali.
languages.name: Yareli Prime

languages.description: Підкорювачка Хвиль перероджується з морської піни. Відблиски орокінської епохи на її обладунках втілюють невмирущу силу молодості.
languages.name: Ярелі-прайм
